title: Muqam congratulates Asma Jahangir Group on historic Supreme Court Bar election victory
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 29 (APP):Federal Minister and PML-N Khyber Pakhtunkhwa President Engineer Amir Muqam extended his congratulations to the Asma Jahangir Group on their win in the Supreme Court Bar Association (SCBA) presidential election.
Muqam in his message commended the  group’s dedication to upholding constitutional principles and the rule of law, noting that their victory symbolizes the legal community’s fight for justice. He offered his sincere congratulations to Ahsan Bhoon and the leaders of the Independent Group.
Muqam expressed hope that Mian Attaullah Advocate from the Asma Jahangir Group would carry on the mission of supporting the welfare of lawyers and the bar association.
He said Asma Jahangir Group’s win is a shining example of their unwavering dedication to the principles of justice and democracy.
